text: Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park is a botanical garden, art museum, and outdoor sculpture park in Grand Rapids Township, Michigan, United States. The Meijer Gardens quickly became a major attraction in the Midwest after it opened in 1995. == References == Category:Coordinates on Wikidata Category:Pages using gadget WikiMiniAtlas Category:Grand Rapids, Michigan Category:Parks in the United States Category:Museums in the United States
title: Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park
